definitions.explanation_en: A feminine given name, commonly used in English-speaking countries, often considered a diminutive or variant of Susan or Suzanne.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个在英语国家常用的女性名字，通常是 Susan 或 Suzanne 的昵称或变体形式。
definitions.example_en: Suzy called her friend to ask about the party tonight.
definitions.example_cn: 苏西打电话给朋友，询问今晚的派对。
